LanguageData.RimTalk.TickManager.ApiKeyMissing: RimTalk: API key or Endpoint is missing.
LanguageData.RimTalk.TalkService.QuotaReached: API quota exceeded. Try reducing prompt size or increasing cooldown.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.CheerfulHelper: Cheerful Helper ‚Äì Warm, upbeat, and encouraging. Always trying to lift spirits.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.CynicalRealist: Cynical Realist ‚Äì Dry, sarcastic, and skeptical. Cuts straight to harsh truths.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.ShyThinker: Shy Thinker ‚Äì Quiet and hesitant. Uses few words but thoughtful when speaking.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Hothead: Hothead ‚Äì Short-tempered, loud, and impulsive. Snaps easily with fiery language.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Philosopher: Philosopher ‚Äì Reflective and abstract. Speaks in riddles or big questions.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.DarkHumorist: Dark Humorist ‚Äì Jokes about grim topics. Finds comedy in misery.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Caregiver: Caregiver ‚Äì Gentle and protective. Comforting, soothing, and nurturing tone.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Opportunist: Opportunist ‚Äì Sly and persuasive. Talks like a hustler, bargains, and twists words.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.OptimisticDreamer: Optimistic Dreamer ‚Äì Imaginative and hopeful. Excited about the future.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Pessimist: Pessimist ‚Äì Gloomy and resigned. Expects failure and highlights risks.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.StoicSoldier: Stoic Soldier ‚Äì Calm, disciplined, and brief. Little emotion, matter-of-fact.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.FreeSpirit: Free Spirit ‚Äì Playful and carefree. Resists rules, shrugs off worries.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Workaholic: Workaholic ‚Äì Driven and restless. Obsessed with duty and efficiency.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Slacker: Slacker ‚Äì Lazy and casual. Complains about effort, prefers comfort.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.NobleIdealist: Noble Idealist ‚Äì Formal and principled. Talks about honor and justice.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.StreetwiseSurvivor: Streetwise Survivor ‚Äì Rough, pragmatic, and cynical. Distrusts others, values grit.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Scholar: Scholar ‚Äì Curious and intellectual. Loves explaining and correcting others.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Jokester: Jokester ‚Äì Lighthearted and silly. Constantly cracks jokes and puns.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.MelancholicPoet: Melancholic Poet ‚Äì Soft-spoken and moody. Expresses feelings poetically.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Paranoid: Paranoid ‚Äì Nervous and distrustful. Assumes betrayal, always suspicious.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Commander: Commander ‚Äì Confident and commanding. Motivates others, expects obedience.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Coward: Coward ‚Äì Timid and fearful. Worries aloud, avoids confrontation.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.ArrogantNoble: Arrogant Noble ‚Äì Proud and condescending. Uses formal, superior language.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.LoyalCompanion: Loyal Companion ‚Äì Steadfast and supportive. Talks about trust and unity.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.CuriousExplorer: Curious Explorer ‚Äì Wide-eyed and eager. Asks questions with enthusiasm.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.ColdRationalist: Cold Rationalist ‚Äì Detached and logical. Focused only on facts and efficiency.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.FlirtatiousCharmer: Flirtatious Charmer ‚Äì Playful, teasing, and bold. Enjoys witty banter.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.BitterOutcast: Bitter Outcast ‚Äì Resentful and sharp. Hostile, quick to recall grievances.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Zealot: Zealot ‚Äì Fanatical and intense. Speaks in absolutes, condemns unbelievers.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Trickster: Trickster ‚Äì Mischievous and mocking. Teases and stirs trouble for fun.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.DeadpanRealist: Deadpan Realist ‚Äì Flat, emotionless tone. Blunt facts with no exaggeration.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.ChildAtHeart: Child-at-Heart ‚Äì Excitable and naive. Talks with wonder, sometimes childish.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.SkepticalScientist: Skeptical Scientist ‚Äì Demands evidence, dismisses superstition, explains logically.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Martyr: Martyr ‚Äì Self-sacrificing and dramatic. Talks about burden and enduring pain.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Manipulator: Manipulator ‚Äì Charming but insincere. Uses flattery and deception.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Rebel: Rebel ‚Äì Defiant and mocking. Challenges authority, questions rules.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Oddball: Oddball ‚Äì Quirky and strange. Uses odd metaphors and unpredictable logic.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.GreedyMerchant: Greedy Merchant ‚Äì Obsessed with trade. Talks in profits, bargains, and losses.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Romantic: Romantic ‚Äì Dreamy and affectionate. Speaks in flowery language about love.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.BattleManiac: Battle Maniac ‚Äì Thrives on conflict. Talks excitedly about combat and glory.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.GrumpyElder: Grumpy Elder ‚Äì Complains constantly. Nostalgic, critical of others.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.AmbitiousClimber: Ambitious Climber ‚Äì Competitive and status-driven. Obsessed with rank.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Mediator: Mediator ‚Äì Calm and fair-minded. Tries to reconcile arguments.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Gambler: Gambler ‚Äì Risk-loving and bold. Speaks in chance metaphors.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.ArtisticSoul: Artistic Soul ‚Äì Talks about beauty, inspiration, and creativity.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Drifter: Drifter ‚Äì Detached and aloof. Casual tone, avoids attachment.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Perfectionist: Perfectionist ‚Äì Demanding and critical. Insists on doing things right.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Vengeful: Vengeful ‚Äì Grudge-holding and intense. Obsessed with revenge.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Toggle.Tooltip: Toggle overlay window\nShift+click for mod settings\nCtrl+click for debug window
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.OverrideInteractions: Override All Interactions with AI Dialogue
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.OverrideInteractionsToo: Enable this to allow AI to override and regenerate dialogue for all interactions (including vanilla RimWorld and other mods). Note: AI dialogue has a cooldown period set above. To generate dialogue more frequently, lower the cooldown.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowSimultaneousConver: When enabled, multiple groups of pawns can talk at the same time. Turn this off if you prefer to see only one conversation at a time or if too many are happening at once.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.DisplayTalkWhenDraftedT: Shows RimTalk bubbles even when pawns are drafted. This temporarily overrides bubble mod settings during talk generation.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowCustomConversation: Allows you to start custom dialogues between characters or talk directly to a character by writing your own lines. Right-click a pawn to begin a conversation.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowSlavesToTalkToolti: Enable this to allow slaves to have AI-generated conversations.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowPrisonersToTalkToo: Enable this to allow prisoners to have AI-generated conversations.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowOtherFactionsToTal: Enable this to allow members of other factions to have AI-generated conversations.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowEnemiesToTalkToolt: Enable this to allow enemies to have AI-generated conversations.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.DisableAiAtSpeedTooltip: To reduce API calls, the AI will be paused when game speed is set to this level or higher.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.ButtonDisplayTooltip: Controls how the debug interface is accessed. 'Tab' adds a main tab, 'Toggle' shows an icon on the bottom bar, and 'None' hides it.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.ExternalEditorTip: Tip: Use copy/paste with an external editor for multiline editing, or type \+n for new lines.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AutoIncludedTip: Tip: Pawn details (traits, relationships, race, age, etc.) are auto-included. Write generic instructions that work across all characters and colonies.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.RateLimitWarning: Warning: Longer prompts will consume more tokens and hit rate limits faster. No prompt caching is used.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.BubbleFadeTip: Tip: Adjust the bubble fade time in the Interaction Bubbles mod settings to keep dialogue visible longer during fast-forward play.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.EventFilterTip: Tip: Only checked event types will be processed by AI. Uncheck types you don't want AI to respond to.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.NoArchivableTypes: No archivable types found. Try starting a game and then rescanning.
LanguageData.RimTalk.PersonaEditor.Title: {0}'s Conversation Style
LanguageData.RimTalk.PersonaEditor.Instruct: Describe how this colonist talks and behaves. Keep it brief (under 300 characters) for best results.
LanguageData.RimTalk.PersonaEditor.TalkFrequencyDesc: Controls how often this colonist initiates talks. Even at the lowest setting, they will still reply when others speak to them. This only affects conversation initiation frequency.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.GoogleApiKeyDesc: Uses the free Gemma3 27B model. For other models or providers, use Advanced Settings.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.CloudProvidersDesc: Use online AI services like Google AI, OpenAI, etc. Requires internet connection and API keys.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.LocalProviderDesc: Use a local AI server running on your machine (Ollama, LM Studio, etc.). Must support OpenAPI.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.CloudApiConfigurationsD: If multiple APIs are enabled, the system will attempt to use them in order. If one API fails, it will automatically try the next enabled API in the list.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.EnableDisableApiConfigT: Enable or disable this API configuration
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.EnterApiKey: (enter valid api key to fetch models)
LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_Api_BaseUrlInfo: If you provide only the base (e.g., http://localhost:1234), /v1/chat/completions will be added automatically. If you enter the full path, it will be used exactly as entered.
LanguageData.RimTalk.FloatMenu.WhatToSayToSelf: What do you want to say to {0}?
LanguageData.RimTalk.FloatMenu.WhatToSayToOther: What do you want {0} to say to {1}?
LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_KnowledgeLibraryDesc: Knowledge library can be used to inject worldview, background knowledge and other common information into AI
LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_DynamicInjectionDesc: Dynamically select the most relevant memories and knowledge based on time, importance and keyword matching
LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_StaticInjectionNote: Will use static injection (by layer order)
LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_ScoreThresholdTitle: Score Threshold (content below this score will not be injected):
LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_WillUseRimTalkConfig: Will attempt to read RimTalk Mod's API configuration
LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_FallbackToIndependent: If RimTalk is not installed or configured, will use the independent configuration below
LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_UseIndependentConfig: Will use the independent configuration below, independent of RimTalk
LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_PawnStatusDesc: Automatically generate status knowledge based on colonist join time
LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_PawnStatusExample: Example: Alice is a new member who joined 3 days ago and doesn't know the colony's history
LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_PawnStatusWarning: When disabled, new members may incorrectly talk about events they didn't experience
LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_PreviewerDesc: Real-time preview of memories and knowledge to be injected to AI (requires entering game)
LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_MustEnterGame: Must enter game to manage knowledge library
